User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://rentcontrol.net/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin and payment processing pages
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /payment-processing
Disallow: /api/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /about
Allow: /contact
Allow: /faq
Allow: /blog
Allow: /tenant-portal
Allow: /login
Allow: /signup

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
